post.author: Gmz1013
post.body:
I've got my own website... so yah... woo... nothing to do with anything though.

http://www.sec-reg.com
still working on some stuff... and some junk...

post.author: Douglas Quaid
post.body: That was the most exciting website I have ever seen ah no, what are you intending to have for the main site?

post.author: Jack Rammsdell
post.body: You have to click the main site button 20 times then it brings you to the real one. It's a nice layout.

post.author: Gmz1013
post.body:
Douglas Quaid wrote:
That was the most exciting website I have ever seen ah no, what are you intending to have for the main site?


its going to be many things. mostly a collect of stuff i've been working on (My stories, my pictures, my movies, and my music... blah blah blah, doom 3 related stuff... all that good stuff.

its still under construction but thats what the forums are there for

and apparently right now i just made my school's sever ban the website lol

post.author: Jack Rammsdell
post.body: nailed by sonicwall?

post.author: Gmz1013
post.body:
Jack Rammsdell wrote:
nailed by sonicwall?

yup... i think so

post.author: Jack Rammsdell
post.body: Every website you access it monitors, either sonicwall staff do not think your website site is appropriate for a school setting or your school network admin saw it under traffic, checked it out and blocked you. Either way, when that happens to a place I am working at, I usually remote to my home computer, and there I can check whatever I want. Some places I have been to are picky enough to block gmail...

post.author: Gmz1013
post.body:
Jack Rammsdell wrote:
Every website you access it monitors, either sonicwall staff do not think your website site is appropriate for a school setting or your school network admin saw it under traffic, checked it out and blocked you. Either way, when that happens to a place I am working at, I usually remote to my home computer, and there I can check whatever I want. Some places I have been to are picky enough to block gmail...

wow... yah, my school isnt that smart, they dont block youtube, they just tell everyone not to use it...
so i think i'm fine, i think maybe the school network died or something.

post.author: Jack Rammsdell
post.body: lol, well they could leave it open for teachers, I didn;'t mean to turn this into a network discussion, The website looks good, is it by hand or a gui editor?

post.author: Gmz1013
post.body:
Jack Rammsdell wrote:
lol, well they could leave it open for teachers, I didn;'t mean to turn this into a network discussion, The website looks good, is it by hand or a gui editor?

mostly by hand... the forum is a bit of both.
